org.axiondb.engine.commands
Class BaseAxionCommand

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.axiondb.engine.commands.BaseAxionCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
AxionCommand
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddConstraintCommand, CheckFileStateCommand, CheckpointCommand, CreateIndexCommand, CreateSequenceCommand, CreateTableCommand, DeleteCommand, DropConstraintCommand, DropSequenceCommand, DropTableCommand, InsertCommand, RemountCommand, SelectCommand, ShutdownCommand, UpdateCommand
public abstract class BaseAxionCommand
extends Object
implements AxionCommand

Abstract base AxionCommand implementation.

Version:
$Revision: 1.10 $ $Date: 2003/05/01 16:39:00 $

protected  Iterator getBindVariableIterator()
          Returns an Iterator over all my BindVariables, in the proper order.
 int getEffectedRowCount()
          Returns the last row count generated by AxionCommand.execute(org.axiondb.Database) or AxionCommand.executeUpdate(org.axiondb.Database).
 ResultSet getResultSet()
          Returns the last ResultSet generated by AxionCommand.execute(org.axiondb.Database) or AxionCommand.executeQuery(org.axiondb.Database).
protected  Set processWhereTree(WhereNode tree)
          Decomposes the given WhereNode into a Set of nodes that were originally joined by ANDs, and adds to this set predicates that are implied by the original tree (for example, given A = 1 and A = B, we can infer B = 1.)
protected  void setEffectedRowCount(int count)
          If sublasses return a number of rows effected, then upon execution, they should set that number here so it can support AxionCommand.execute(org.axiondb.Database)
protected  void setResultSet(ResultSet rset)
          If subclasses create a AxionResultSet upon execution, they should set it here so that they can support AxionCommand.execute(org.axiondb.Database).

Method Detail

setResultSet

protected void setResultSet(ResultSet rset)
If subclasses create a AxionResultSet upon execution, they should set it here so that they can support AxionCommand.execute(org.axiondb.Database).

See Also:
getResultSet()

getResultSet

public ResultSet getResultSet()
Description copied from interface: AxionCommand
Returns the last ResultSet generated by AxionCommand.execute(org.axiondb.Database) or AxionCommand.executeQuery(org.axiondb.Database).

Specified by:

If sublasses return a number of rows effected, then upon execution, they should set that number here so it can support AxionCommand.execute(org.axiondb.Database)

processWhereTree

protected Set processWhereTree(WhereNode tree)
Decomposes the given WhereNode into a Set of nodes that were originally joined by ANDs, and adds to this set predicates that are implied by the original tree (for example, given A = 1 and A = B, we can infer B = 1.)
